story:
We received many supporting messages from our fans also as many requests to relaunch our Indiegogo campaign. You want to have a chance to buy the pen before we officially introduce it to the market. So this is the last campaign related to 3Dsimo pen before its commercial launch in April.

Once again wholeheartedly thank to all our fans who already pre-ordered 3Dsimo in previous campaigns. All pre-ordered devices from previous campaigns will be distributed till the end of March.

Let us to inform you that official market price after commercial launch will be 99 USD + VAT and postage. So you HAVE A LAST CHANCE to get your pen for a discounted price.

Worldwide shipment included in the price is 15 USD.

What is it?

3Dsimo is the next generation of 3D pens. It offers very quiet performance with access through a handy manhole for easy maintenance.

This innovative new 3D pen allows the user to define a speed, chose a temperature from 130 °C to 250°C and print from various materials including ABS,PLA,HIPS,PET,PC,FLEXI,PVA,Thermochrome,LAYWOO-D3,BENDLAY, SANDSTONE,smartABS etc.

3Dsimo is the first 3D pen in the world that offers you the option to choose the print settings on a digital display. This enables you to adjust the temperature and speed of material flow allowing amazing opportunities for your creativity. 3Dsimo can handle various materials as ABS, PLA, HIPS, PET, PC, FLEXI, Thermochrome, LAYWOO-D3, BENDLAY, SANDSTONE, smartABS, PVA (water-soluble material) at different temperatures in order to achieve fast filling or even the ability to print in the air ! Other options include a backlit display, with the function to turn on preheating or set the memory for predefined settings. You don’t need to remember the temperature or speed for each material as the 3Dsimo will predefine the settings for you. Just select the material you want to use. If a new material becomes available, you can modify the temperature, speed and preheating in the custom settings option in the main menu. Everything is neatly controlled and displayed on the LCD display for your convenience and ease of use. These parameters are vital to determine the appropriate method of drawing so the 3Dsimo is the only 3D pen in the world offering such an easy and fast way to move between methods for drawing and material types.


With the 3Dsimo you will not be limited by the choice of materials. For example chose between golden, silver, wooden or flexible PLA. Over time, the number of new materials will be increasing due to the growing trend of 3D printing and the 3Dsimo is fully prepared for this due to its ability to configure all the parameters and thermal feedback for determining the exact temperature required for each material type.

How it works?

3Dsimo is so simple to be used just like a pencil. Simply plug it in, set the desired speed and temperature according to the material and start drawing. 3Dsimo is based on the principle of FDM technology which means the materials are pushed through the pen to the end where it is heated allowing you to form amazing shapes. You can even print into the air to create a free standing object or create infill to give your model a solid form easily and quickly. There is no problem, just let your imagination make your choice. After a while of using it, you will realize that with 3Dsimo you create fantastic objects with no end of possibilities.


3Dsimo has many uses

• To materialize your ideas

• Repairing of plastic devices

• Bonding and assembling models from 3D printers

• Repair abortive print jobs (thanks to the repair capability, you don’t need to re-run your originalPrint job again thus saving time and money)

• Creating jewelry

• Simply to enjoy modeling

What we can create?

When drawing with a normal pencil one is still improving and invents new variations of drawings, the same applies for 3Dsimo. With 3Dsimo you may always think up new forms of creating 3D objects. Printing can be done on almost every solid material but for PLA, PET,FLEXI we recommend a glass surface and paper for ABS, HIPS.

Components and Equipment:

3Dsimo weighs just 196gr so is easy and comfortable to grip. 3Dsimo is supplied with a small screwdriver and tweezers for handling the service window and of course a power source. You also get a starter package of materials for experimentation. The package includes 5 colours of ABS strings, 5 colours of PLA strings, 1x PET , 1x HIPS string. Each filament has a length of 2.5 meters, so you have whopping 30 meters for testing. We are progressively inventing and generating extenders for drawing geometrical figures to enable you to take your creativity to a whole new level. 3Dsimo has a functional design for adding extenders to protect you from accidentally touching the hot ending.

You can use many plastic materials designed for 3D printers. 3Dsimo uses a string with a width of 1.75 mm, the width that is most common for today´s printers so you can easily obtain new materials.

With functional materials such as fluorescence, phosphorescent , elastic , electro conductive (only for the creation of potentiometers and el . Devices based on resistance) or even heat changing colour materials as you can see in the video (orchid example). Drawing is limited only by your imagination and the size of the table.

The Team


Frequently asked questions:

1. What material can be used?  

Only with 3Dsimo you can use different types of material as ABS (a material used for common toy bricks), PLA nature friendly material with starch as the main ingredient, PVA which is soluble in water and last but not least, nylon. Material used is a 1.75mm fiber. You can choose appropriate temperature and material speed, so you have more options on what kind of materials to use.

2. What comes in Full Commercial Package?

3Dsimo full set includes 3Dsimo amazing pen, a power supply unit, 5 colours of ABS strings, 5 colours of PLA strings, 1x PET , 1x HIPS string. Each filament has a length of 2.5 meters, so you have whopping 30 meters for testing. We are developing a few more amazing extensions now and you can buy the first two right now!

3.Where do we get that material once we ran out ?

We are going to offer you all above mentioned material types in all color options in a 20m pack. If you have another request, just let us know.

4.Is it toxic, safe for kids to craft? I mean will it be hot while using or washable when used on skin or clothes?

Materials such as ABS,PLA,PVA or Nylon are not dangerous or toxic. You can find these materials in common children’s models / play bricks, foodstuffs or textiles. The material is hot for a very limited time and therefore care should be taken not to touch the material when applied until it is dry.We recommend you do not apply it to your body, but for example application on textile, glass or even paper is fine.

5. Battery life of this device, can we have more information about it how it works actually?

5.Our device does not use a battery, it is supplied with a power supply unit. In the gallery you can find a video previewing all the parameters you can setup. 3Dsimo is based on the principle of FDM technology thus extruding plastic string through the hot end. You can choose a temperature which differs for each kind of material or use. It is up to you how thick layer of the material is you decide to use. A few minutes practicing changing the speed and temperature and you will be able to bring your ideas to life.
story_txt:
We received many supporting messages from our fans also as many requests
to relaunch our Indiegogo campaign. You want to have a chance to buy the pen
before we officially introduce it to the market. So this is the last campaign
related to 3Dsimo pen before its commercial launch in April. 
Once again wholeheartedly thank to all our fans who already pre-ordered
3Dsimo in previous campaigns. All pre-ordered devices from previous campaigns will
be distributed till the end of March. 
Let us to inform you that official market price after commercial launch
will be 99 USD + VAT and postage. So you HAVE A LAST CHANCE to get your pen for
a discounted price.

story:
WHY WONDER WATERS

  • Childhood obesity has doubled in the past 30 years.
  • Experts believe that if the obesity rate continues, this generation could become the first in American history to live shorter lives than their parents.
  • 1 in 3 kids will develop diabetes before they are an adult.
  • Research links high sugar consumption - particularly our nation's sugary drink addiction - to obesity and diabetes, as well as diseases like cancer.
  • When a child’s body is dehydrated, organ functioning is impaired - beginning with the brain, the digestive system, and the heart.
  • Drinking water is imperative to optimal health.

THE SOLUTION?

Wonder Waters™ is the sugar drink alternative! It's yummy, bubbly, organic fruit infused sparkling water that will reduce children's sugar intake and keep our kids healthy, happy, and hydrated.

WONDER WATERS IS IDEAL FOR...

         

THE IMPACT

Wonder Waters is poised to leverage the popularity of kids drinks…but we provide the healthy alternative!

  • Wonder Waters will be USDA Certified Organic
  • Wonder Waters will be GMO Free
  • Wonder Waters will donate 1% of gross profits to children’s health organizations.

  

All of our artwork is made by Julia (7) and Ian (12) !


OUR CAMPAIGN GOAL

Help us raise $50,000 to launch Wonder Waters! We will use your contributions to:
  1. MAKE WATER: Run our first production batch.
  2. GRASSROOTS BUZZ BUILDING: We like fizzy water and we like buzzy word of mouth so we will produce sampling events in San Francisco, Mill Valley, Los Angeles and New York.
  3. KEY HIRES: In addition to the team members already committed to supporting our vision, we need to hire experts in functional beverage development, branding, fundraising (after this seed funding, it's time to do a full round!), and social entrepreneurship. As a cause driven company, we are committed to working with individuals who share our commitment to making products that improve children’s health and wellness.

If we do not reach our funding goal, we will work with our Advisory Board to determine where the funds raised can have the biggest ROI. For example, a smaller production run, and a reduced number of R&D sampling events.

BUILDING ON SUCCESS

 We are already working with people who have built successful companies and we believe that our mission, and our team's experience, will be a winning combination.

  • The quantity (8 oz skinny aluminum can) will be small enough that children will be able to proudly finish their drink and feel good.
  • Americans spent $11 billion on bottled waters in 2011 and a 5% to 6% growth is expected in 2014 (BMG Inc., 2013)
  • Wonder Waters packaging will be based on fun, super hero characters that will inspire children to drink water. 
  • Wonder Waters will not contain any added citric acid, a common ingredient in kids' drinks and sodas, which is an extremely detrimental additive to children's developing teeth.

PERKS




FROM THE FOUNDER, ANNIE ST. JOHN

"As a Pediatric Nurse Practitioner, I am well aware of the rising rates of childhood obesity and juvenile diabetes.

As a mom, I know how hard it can be to get kids to drink water.

By making a yummy, bubbly water, lightly flavored with organic fruit juices, and very low sugar content, we believe we can shift the soda habit to a Wonder Waters habit, and improve children's health dramatically.

It's what I want for my kids; It's what I suggest for your kids."


ANNIE and SOME OF OUR EARLY SUPPORTERS                     


Annie and the REAL Founders, Julia and Ian

                 
                               "We want every kid to be a Wonder Waters kid!"

FOLLOW us on Pinterest @WonderWaters
TWEET with us @GoWonderWaters
LIKE us on FB @DrinkWonderWaters
Learn More at www.wonderwaters.com

WWW.WONDERWATERS.COM

GOT QUESTIONS? Feel free to reach out to Annie directly. Annie@WonderWaters.com

A special THANK YOU to Andy Miller, Jamie Oliveira and Robin Moore of Plus M Productions.  We appreciate all of their extra hard work in putting together our awesome video!  And a huge, heartfelt thank you to Kimberly, Lisa, and Paul!  And to Allen Miesner, for all of his assistance on our logo and labels. And, last but certainly not least, to Lynn Hall, for her early funding which allowed all of this to happen!  My kids and I are eternally grateful!

story:
Today, one of the biggest questions parents are asking around the world is on the topic of vaccinations. 

There are many polarizing voices out there; leaving many parents feeling confused about what to do. Legislation is being passed around the globe to move people towards vaccine compliance as the anti-vaccine movement grows and first world countries are primed for preventable outbreaks.

Science has advanced us into understanding more about biochemistry and genetics: specifically in the area of methylation.

We now know that almost half of the 4 million babies being born in America every year have some form of a methylation disorder that is NOT addressed in a newborn inborn error of metabolism screening.

Healthy methylation is crucial for conception and prenatal development through epigenetic regulation as well as childhood through adulthood health by reducing the risk for chronic, preventable diseases like heart disease, cancer, stroke and neurodegeneration.

That's why we developed Vax Support. Vax Support is an innovative, first of its kind, dietary supplement that "hugs" a child's methylation pathways, supporting their underlying biochemistry and providing parents peace of mind.

Vax Support is to be used as a daily supplement throughout childhood. Its intended use if for children 6 months of age to 18 years of age.


Methylation is a new, breakthrough concept that is crucial for overall health. Check out our animated video that explains methylation in an easy-to-understand manner.



Vax Support is a daily supplement that is designed to support methylation*. Vax Support will be a delicious orange-flavored liquid for children of all ages.
We are using the highest standards in manufacturing to provide a quality, pure and effective product.

Vax Support is free of casein, dairy, corn, egg, fish, gluten, wheat, peanuts, shellfish, soy and tree nuts.

Vax Support is free of artificial sweeteners, colorings or flavorings.

* These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease


Suggested use: 1 serving per day. Can be mixed in breast milk, formula, yogurt, applesauce, oatmeal, orange juice, apple juice and other mediums that are age appropriate. 

Other ingredients (for taste and mouth feel): Purified water, stevia leaf extract, vegetable glycerin, medium chain triglyceride (from coconut), organic cane sugar, natural flavor(s), citric acid, sorbic acid, malic acid, xanthan gum.

Dr. Karl Holtzer, MD, MS

Dr. Holtzer is committed to bettering the lives of children across the country and world. He understands the many struggles and questions that parents are facing today regarding how to best take care of their children. His many years of experience in the field is priceless as is his commitment to the study of the science of medicine and its current evidence as it appears in today’s literature. He wants only the best for children and their families because, after all, they deserve it.

Dr. Holtzer has been a pediatrician for over 25 years. He graduated from Jefferson Medical College of Thomas Jefferson University with academic honors. He went on to do his residency at Children’s Hospital of Pittsburgh, consistently ranked as one the top residency programs and Children’s hospitals in the country. He has worked in both general pediatric as well as academic practice where he taught medical students and residents on a consistent basis. He has been awarded numerous awards by his peers for providing the best pediatric care. He was inducted into the Best Doctors of America database as well as Consumer’s Guide to Best Pediatricians.

Dr. Holtzer has always had an interest in natural and functional ways of healing, especially with nutritional approaches. This led him to study nutrition at the University of Bridgeport in CT where he obtained his Masters of Science in Human Nutrition. He is also a member of the Institute for Functional Medicine.

Sarah Morgan, MS

Sarah has over a decade of experience working in the health and nutrition field empowering individuals, families and communities to take next steps on their health journey. Sarah has worked in a variety of settings from private practice, corporate wellness, Whole Foods Market and community health initiatives. When Sarah became a mother, she realized she could apply her knowledge to the parenting questions she was asking to not only better her daughter’s life, but also the lives of children around the world.

Sarah met Dr. Holtzer while studying nutrition at the University of Bridgeport where she obtained her Masters of Science in Human Nutrition. She knew they would be a “power team” to impact the lives of many and so they formed Functional Medicine Solutions and launched their first product, Vax Support.

Sarah is passionate about taking complex concepts within the health field and making them sticky and easy-to-understand for everyone. She is excited to be part of a company that brings knowledge and empowerment to every home around the world.



$5: Wall of Fame Thank You

Thank you for helping make this company a reality! We will place your name on the www.vaxsupport.com Wall of Fame page when the campaign ends.






$30: 1 Bottle of Vax Support + shipping

This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included.

*Must add international shipping perk if this is to be shipped international.




$60:  2 Bottles of Vax Support + shipping

This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included. 

*Must add international shipping perk if this is to be shipped international.



$90:  3 Bottles + 10% Off Next Order

This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support and 10% off your next order. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included.

*Must add international shipping perk if this is to be shipped international.



$180: 6 Bottles + 15% Off Next Order 

Want to stock up on this awesome new product? This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included.

*Must add (2) international shipping perks if this is to be shipped international.



$360: 12 Bottles + 20% Off Next Order

Want to stock up on this awesome new product, have multiple children or want to share with loved ones? This is a great option for you. You will also receive a coupon code for 20% off your next order.
Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included. *Must add (2) international shipping perks if this is to be shipped international. 



$750: Genetic Consult with Sarah + 3 Bottles of Vax Support

Sarah also know as "The Gene Queen" specializes in the area of nutrigenomics. This perk would include a 90 minute phone or in-person (Denver) consult to review your genetic results and get food and nutrient recommendations tailored specifically to you!
You must purchase a genetic kit from 23andme.com, ancestry.com, family tree DNA or Gene by Gene and generate your gene variance report from livewello.com. Also includes 3 bottles of Vax Support (a $119 value)



$1499: Q & A Session with Dr. Holtzer + 3 Bottles of Vax Support

Do you have some general questions about your child that you would like to ask a experienced pediatrician with a specialty in functional medicine? If so, this 60-minute phone or virtual session with Dr. Holtzer is for  you!
Along with the Q & A Session, you will receive 3 bottles of Vax Support (a $119 value)



$4,999: Clinic Visit with Dr. Holtzer

Want a 90 minute in person functional medicine appointment with Dr. Holtzer at his center in Pittsburgh? This visit allows for medical advice and an official patient-doctor relationship.

This perk includes:
1. 90 minute functional medicine appointment
2. One airfare in the continental US
3. 2 night stay in Pittsburgh
4. 3 bottles of Vax Support (a $119 value)



$7499: Exclusive Trip to Colorado

Want to get away to beautiful Colorado and meet Dr. Holtzer and Sarah? This perk includes a 2 night stay at the luxurious 5 star Broadmoor Hotel nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado Springs.

This perk includes: 2 night stay at the Broadmoor hotel, two airline tickets in the continental US, lunch or dinner with Dr. Holtzer and Sarah at the Broadmoor and 3 bottles of Vax Support.


Our Indiegogo campaign will fund our first order of Vax Support. There is great research supporting changes in methylation status with proper nutrients. We will use some of our first product order to begin the process of conducting a third party, randomized clinical trial to show the scientific effectiveness of Vax Support.

Shipping + Production Time.

Since our expansion is so new, this campaign will help us gauge how much inventory we'll need. We will be putting in our order for production as soon as we can determine the amount of units to order based on response on Indiegogo (we're aiming to do this halfway through the campaign to get a head start).

Once our order is in, production takes 8-10 weeks. As soon as everything is ready, your items will be ship. Please note: for shipments destined outside the USA, Functional Medicine Solutions LLC is not responsible for any brokerage fees and/or duties and taxes.

We will be posting updates on our progress through the 'Updates' section on this campaign as we go along. You'll be getting those updates straight to your email. We promise that we will work hard to get this done as quickly as we can.

The Impact

We created this company with a vision that chronic disease will someday be a blip on the radar, not the staggering statistic today that states that over 130 million people suffer from such. We also created this company with the hope that vaccine preventable deaths will continue to be a thing of the past and that the general population might feel more at ease in vaccinating their children.

Risks & Challenges

We are super excited to bring Vax Support to every child, but there are intrinsic challenges in getting our product manufactured in a timely fashion to meet demands.  We're working day in and day out to finalize our manufacturer to ensure the best fit for the highest-quality product. As we gear up for production, there will likely be minor changes and adjustments to improve the final formulation. We will keep you updated with any changes, and how or why they are implemented.

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your friends, family and loved ones about our product and help us spread the word!

Healthy methylation is crucial for conception and prenatal development through epigenetic regulation as well as childhood through adulthood health by reducing the risk for chronic, preventable diseases like heart disease, cancer, stroke and neurodegeneration.
That's why we developed Vax Support. Vax Support is an innovative, first of its kind, dietary supplement that "hugs" a child's methylation pathways, supporting their underlying biochemistry and providing parents peace of mind.
Vax Support is to be used as a daily supplement throughout childhood. Its intended use if for children 6 months of age to 18 years of age.




Methylation is a new, breakthrough concept that is crucial for overall health. Check out our animated video that explains methylation in an easy-to-understand manner.


Vax Support is a daily supplement that is designed to support methylation*. Vax Support will be a delicious orange-flavored liquid for children of all ages. We are using the highest standards in manufacturing to provide a quality, pure and effective product.Vax Support is free of casein, dairy, corn, egg, fish, gluten, wheat, peanuts, shellfish, soy and tree nuts. Vax Support is free of artificial sweeteners, colorings or flavorings. 
* These
 statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not 
intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease

Suggested use: 1 serving per day. Can be mixed in breast milk, formula, yogurt, applesauce, oatmeal, orange juice, apple juice and other mediums that are age appropriate. 

Other ingredients (for taste and mouth feel): Purified water, stevia leaf extract, vegetable glycerin, medium chain triglyceride (from coconut), organic cane sugar, natural flavor(s), citric acid, sorbic acid, malic acid, xanthan gum.



Dr. Karl Holtzer, MD, MS
Dr.
 Holtzer is committed to bettering the lives of children across the 
country and world. He understands the many struggles and questions that 
parents are facing today regarding how to best take care of their 
children. His many years of experience in the field is priceless as is 
his commitment to the study of the science of medicine and its current 
evidence as it appears in today’s literature. He wants only the best for
 children and their families because, after all, they deserve it.
Dr. Holtzer has been a pediatrician for over 25 years. He graduated 
from Jefferson Medical College of Thomas Jefferson University with 
academic honors. He went on to do his residency at Children’s Hospital 
of Pittsburgh, consistently ranked as one the top residency programs and
 Children’s hospitals in the country. He has worked in both general 
pediatric as well as academic practice where he taught medical students 
and residents on a consistent basis. He has been awarded numerous awards
 by his peers for providing the best pediatric care. He was inducted 
into the Best Doctors of America database as well as Consumer’s Guide to
 Best Pediatricians.
Dr. Holtzer has always had an interest in natural and functional ways
 of healing, especially with nutritional approaches. This led him to 
study nutrition at the University of Bridgeport in CT where he obtained 
his Masters of Science in Human Nutrition. He is also a member of the 
Institute for Functional Medicine.
 



Sarah Morgan, MS
Sarah
 has over a decade of experience working in the health and nutrition 
field empowering individuals, families and communities to take next 
steps on their health journey. Sarah has worked in a variety of settings
 from private practice, corporate wellness, Whole Foods Market and 
community health initiatives. When Sarah became a mother, she realized 
she could apply her knowledge to the parenting questions she was asking to not only better her daughter’s life, but also the lives of 
children around the world.
Sarah met Dr. Holtzer while studying nutrition at the University of 
Bridgeport where she obtained her Masters of Science in Human Nutrition.
 She knew they would be a “power team” to impact the lives of many and 
so they formed Functional Medicine Solutions and launched their first 
product, Vax Support.
Sarah is passionate about taking complex concepts within the health 
field and making them sticky and easy-to-understand for everyone. She is
 excited to be part of a company that brings knowledge and empowerment 
to every home around the world.





$5: Wall of Fame Thank You
Thank you for helping make this company a reality! We will place your name on the www.vaxsupport.com Wall of Fame page when the campaign ends.










$30: 1 Bottle of Vax Support + shipping
This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included. 
*Must add international shipping perk if this is to be shipped international.






$60:  2 Bottles of Vax Support + shipping
This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included. 
*Must add international shipping perk if this is to be shipped international.





$90:  3 Bottles + 10% Off Next Order 
This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax 
Support and 10% off your next order. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US 
included. *Must add international shipping perk if this is to be shipped international.





$180: 6 Bottles + 15% Off Next Order  
Want to stock up on this awesome new product? This perk allows you to be one of the first to receive a bottle of Vax Support. Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included. *Must add (2) international shipping perks if this is to be shipped international.





$360: 12 Bottles + 20% Off Next Order 
Want to stock up on this awesome new product, have multiple children or want to share with loved ones? This is a great option for you. You will also receive a coupon code for 20% off your next order.Sales tax, shipping and handling in the continental US included. *Must add (2) international shipping perks if this is to be shipped international. 





$750: Genetic Consult with Sarah + 3 Bottles of Vax Support
Sarah also know as "The Gene Queen" specializes in the area of nutrigenomics. This perk would include a 90 minute phone or in-person (Denver) consult to review your genetic results and get food and nutrient recommendations tailored specifically to you!You must purchase a genetic kit from 23andme.com, ancestry.com, family tree DNA or Gene by Gene and generate your gene variance report from livewello.com. Also includes 3 bottles of Vax Support (a $119 value)





$1499: Q & A Session with Dr. Holtzer + 3 Bottles of Vax Support
Do you have some general questions about your child that you would like to ask a experienced pediatrician with a specialty in functional medicine? If so, this 60-minute phone or virtual session with Dr. Holtzer is for  you! Along with the Q & A Session, you will receive 3 bottles of Vax Support (a $119 value)





$4,999: Clinic Visit with Dr. Holtzer
Want a 90 minute in person functional medicine appointment with Dr. Holtzer at his center in Pittsburgh? This visit allows for medical advice and an official patient-doctor relationship.This perk includes:1. 90 minute functional medicine appointment2. One airfare in the continental US3. 2 night stay in Pittsburgh4. 3 bottles of Vax Support (a $119 value)





$7499: Exclusive Trip to Colorado
Want to get away to beautiful Colorado and meet Dr. Holtzer and Sarah? This perk includes a 2 night stay at the luxurious 5 star Broadmoor Hotel nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains in Colorado Springs. This perk includes: 2 night stay at the Broadmoor hotel, two airline tickets in the continental US, lunch or dinner with Dr. Holtzer and Sarah at the Broadmoor and 3 bottles of Vax Support.





Our Indiegogo campaign will fund our first order of Vax Support. There is great research supporting changes in methylation status with proper nutrients. We will use some of our first product order to begin the process of conducting a third party, randomized clinical trial to show the scientific effectiveness of Vax Support. 


Shipping
+ Production Time.
Since our expansion
is so new, this campaign will help us gauge how much inventory we'll
need. We will be putting in our order for production as soon as we can
determine the amount of units to order based on response on Indiegogo (we're
aiming to do this halfway through the campaign to get a head start).

Once our order is in, production takes 8-10 weeks. As soon as everything is
ready, your items will be ship. Please note: for shipments destined outside the
USA, Functional Medicine Solutions LLC is not responsible for any brokerage fees
and/or duties and taxes.

We will be posting updates on our progress through the 'Updates' section on
this campaign as we go along. You'll be getting those updates straight to your
email. We promise that we will work hard to
get this done as quickly as we can.
  The Impact

We created this company with a vision that chronic
disease will someday be a blip on the radar, not the staggering statistic today
that states that over 130 million people suffer from such. We also created this
company with the hope that vaccine preventable deaths will continue to be a
thing of the past and that the general population might feel more at ease in
vaccinating their children.

  Risks & Challenges
We are super excited to bring Vax Support to every child, but there are intrinsic challenges in getting our product manufactured in a timely fashion to meet demands.  
We're working day in and day out to finalize our manufacturer to ensure the best fit for the highest-quality product. As we gear up for production, there will 
likely be minor changes and adjustments to improve the final formulation. We
 will keep you updated with any changes, and how or why they are 
implemented. 
  Other Ways You Can HelpTell your friends, family and loved ones about our product and help us spread the word!

story:
The care home my gran is in have lost her teeth.
We need to raise £250 for a new set, but we have to put a minimum of £500 for this site.
Any help would mean Violet can get a new set of pearly white teeth!!

She is already selling her home to pay for the cost of her care home so she cannot afford the cost of new teeth as well, especially since it is not her fault that they have been lost.

She doesn't look the same without her smile, please help xx

She doesn't look the same without her smile, please help xx

story:
The gym and the project

Since 2007 I had a vision to set up a  rock climbing gym in Yerevan, so we would have a place to keep on climbing during winter season, as well to attract more people into climbing.  And finally, my friend Daniel Domingo supported my inspiration and we opened "Boulder Town" on Oct 2015 in downtown of Yerevan!

This was the greatest experience for rock climbing we ever had in Armenia. The efficiency of indoor climbing was obvious: youth who where already in climbing got significantly improved during this year, and the most important - more and more kids and youth came to try and got involved in Climbing Activity!

On the other hand the Armenian Alpine Club, which is a member federation of IFSC (International Federation of Sport Climbing) and UIAA, has counted on the gym where to prepare an Armenian National Climbing Teams (both for youth and adult), which would be representing Armenia in international competitions! 

Initially, when with Daniel we were planning the project, we knew that rock climbing is very new in Armenia, we would start hard and won't get a benefit from this project, or even bring back the investment. We considered that even if the gym covers its monthly expenses then we just would be happy that it exists and we have an indoor place to climb! :)

But for some reasons it didn't, and we had to close the gym on past November, after a year of working..  But it's OK, we gained a LOT!!!  Now we have an experience of building, managing and running a climbing gym in Armenia! And thanks to this first step we already know the local specifics and how it must be done, for which we only need your excitement and support to our project!

P.S, this is the second laps of our IndieGogo campaign, during the first one we reached only 12%. 

Analyzing: what we learned and what do we plan to do!

  1. Rock climbing in Armenia is very new, especially as an indoor activity. But it must pass this natural period of enthusiasm and initiatives, after which indoor climbing will get popular and grown up! That shows the increasing feed back we have through fb messages and calls, people asking how can they come into our gym and about our conditions.
  2. Lack of advertisement. We thought that a "facebook group" promotion would be enough as the most of youth hang out in internet today. We didn't even spend money to use fb ad service, thinking just tagging our visitors in pictures would be enough. But it was not, so we know that we must work properly on advertisement in general, as well to collaborate with schools and universities.
  3. Small climbing surface (construction wall) and few climbing holds. The resources of our first step was merely enough to build a good climbing wall with overhanging and positive relief, although over 60sc/m is too small for the leisure visitors. As well very few 250 repetitive climbing holds get boring after 2-3 months climbing. So here is where we think the most of raised fund must go - for making the climbing wall larger around and on sealing, and to buy new climbing holds!
  4. The high entrance fee. We had set up a flexible entrance fee: from 10.000 to 20.000 AMD for monthly fee and from 1.000 to 3.000 per day entrance. But the feed back from our visitors and from our social surveys showed that the entrance fee must be even less and more flexible, like 12.000 and 1.500 max for monthly and daily fees.   As well for stimulating the visits we will have a special day in a week to open the doors for visitors free of charge!
How will we use the money you have donated

If we inspired you enough to get our claimed sum, then:

  1. The 8% + $25 will go for IndieGogo platform and bank transfer fees.
  2. 40% of the fund will go to climbing wall construction and crash pad (sponges & blanket) expenses.
  3. 35% of the fund will go for buying and importing new climbing holds.
  4. The 10% of the fund will go to assistant workers (the main constructing I (have done) and will do myself volunteering).
  5. And around 7% will go to advertising campaign such as facebook ads, brochures, TV or radio ads. 
What if we get more than we claimed? It's fuckin amazing!!! we will have money to cover our regular expenses during first months such as: taxes, gym rent, salaries for gym manager and cleaner, communal expenses. Or to build some more climbing surfaces and get some more climbing holds! ;)

What if we get less than we claimed?  Don't panic, it's still fine! We can still build some climbing sc/meters, buy some holds and our visitors will be even more happy ;)

How can "Boulder Town" make Armenia better if it starts working again? 

The youth in Yerevan will have another option for amazing leisure, the kids will get involved in rock climbing and they will go for outdoors next. They will start to love and appreciate the nature of Armenia, they will take care of it. We will build together a nice climbing community with manures of respecting each other, responsibility for teamwork and team-safety. Tomorrow's athletes will be born in this community who will go to IFSC international climbing championships with Armenian Alpine Club SNGO. Climbing and Mountaineering is our trade, so we try to make better Armenia this way, is't it cool? 

Risks & Challenges

Our project has as much risks as anybody or any project else in this crazy world..))

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our project with people who know what is passion, pursuit, hard work and LUCK, and they will donate for us, be sure! ;)

story:
Small baby-girl Haya Nazia needs urgently cochlear-implants for both ears. The specialist Dr. Muaaz Tarabichi at the American Hospital in Dubai has confirmed the lack of hearing of 95% on both ears. The family of Haya Nazia came from Sri Lanka to Dubai, because the father found a small bank job there. There are 2 more sisters and brothers and the family wouldn't be able at all to pay the costs of the implants and the operations. But Haya Nazia is going to learn to speak and for this she would need to hear something. She should be operated in the first year of her life. Who could help?

Time is running so fast and we ask you respectfully to donate a small amount for Haya.

Haya's father is a good friend of my husband and me. We are a German-Sri Lankan couple and know the family Jaldin personally. They would do all for their kids, but as a small employee in a bank it is absolutely impossible to finance those implants. The full amount for both ears would be around 120000 USD. A health insurance system is not available. The preliminary estimate form from the American Hospital in Dubai, the diagnosis and the letter of the father you can download here:

http://www.ulme-mini-verlag.de/Haya_Jaldin_Coch....

The family would be happy about every contribution; if there would be a doctor, who could do the operation for free or a hospital, who could provide cheaper implants, please don't hesitate to contact us or the family itself.

e.sinas@yahoo.de (Germany)

rezzanno@emirates.net.ae (Father)

Father : Rezzanno Jaldin  Mobile + 971503449741 Office – +97147015347

Mother: Nizreen Jayman Mobile +971502703569 Home +97165752084

We, Shashika and Martina, have a small publishing company in Germany and publish bilingual poetry and children stories. We also focus on academic books concerning Cultural Studies and ethnomusicology. We don't make lot of profit, but if we do, we sponsor social projects like this:

http://www.ulme-mini-verlag.de/bookshop/ueber-u....

story:
This campaign is about something that could happen to anyone.  It's about having your health stolen from you at 46 years old, through no fault of your own.  It's about working hard in your professional life for the benefit of other people, never asking for anything for yourself.  This describes my best friend, Suzanne. 

Suzanne was diagnosed with colon cancer last year. She almost died and had to have extensive surgery, including a colostomy.  She has had to undergo endless testing and treatment since then and now needs another operation.

Suzanne has no family.  She has not been able to work because she is so ill and she has depleted her savings during this long illness paying medical bills and living expenses. 

I had posted a campaign last month in an attempt to keep Suzanne in her apartment.  The campaign was not successful in raising the money needed to keep her in her apartment, but then a miracle occurred and a neighbor stepped in to make up the difference to pay her rent for December. 

Now I am posting, once again, to seek assistance for Suzanne to help to pay her rent & utilities and to buy food for the next few months so she can make it through another surgery. To accomplish this, she needs money to keep her going as the surgery recovery will require a wound vac and 2 months of healing time.

I would appreciate any help you could provide for her and I pray you can help her where I cannot. God bless you and thank you for reading this campaign.  I know my friend:  she is the most generous person I have ever met.  She has given so much of herself to helping others.  She works on non-profit projects, such as getting clean water to people who need it.  Now it is she that needs the help of others - a strange position for her to be in because she is usually the one doing the helping.  Please help my friend make it through this next operation so she can hopefully beat this cancer and get back to the business of doing what she loves the most:  helping other people.

Please donate today to help Suzanne stay in her home while she is fighting cancer.

story:
MWD Health Manager is a multilingual web-based application for hospitals, home care organizations, physicians and patients.

Rotterdam, Netherlands - Ehealth, electronic access of medical records, and mhealth, mobile phone storage and access of this information, has become a major industry. According to Fred Slot, however, that has not translated into user-friendly, effective products.

For this reason, Fred has spent the past few years developing MWD® Health Manager iEHR, a multilingual web-based application for hospitals, physicians and patients. The MWD Health Manager, available as a smartphone app, provides a complete set of functions that enable the patient to follow doctor's prescriptions and gather, maintain and analyze health conditions. It is particularly valuable for patients with chronic diseases.

“The patient disease management capabilities of most of today’s ehealth and mhealth  gadgets vary from unreliable to poor to insufficient,” said Fred, a Rottrerdam, Netherlands, resident. “Managing data is not the same thing as managing a patient.”

A software designer who was diagnosed with diabetes in 2001, Fred developed a powerful Internet-based method for doctors and patients to communicate. This new software system allowed him to follow his insulin therapy religiously and monitor blood sugar more accurately. After two years, he no longer needed insulin injections.

“What started as a self-care solution became a passion for promoting diabetes awareness and providing the best possible software solution for managing any long-term condition,” Fred said. 

Using the MWD Health Manager iEHR, patients always have access to their data , simplify medication procedures and establish communications with doctors and health centers. All data stored and communications are secure; doctors can monitor a patient’s progress only after being authorized by the patient.

“With this type of support system, the quality of life for patients with a chronic disease can be preserved or improved significantly, while at the same time making health care costs more predictable,” said Fred. “It will save lots of time and costs for all parties involved.”

For additional information, visit the MWD Health Manager website, 
http://mwdhealthmanager.com

Fred can be reached directly at info/mwdhealthmanager.com


This self-care software system is fully operative but has yet to be extensively marketed. 

Fred is estimating that he’ll need about $250,000 to promote the MWD Health Manager to individuals, hospitals, home care organizations, physicians and professional management teams all over the world.

In order to generate this capital, he has launched this Indiegogo campaign.

Donations of any amount are welcome. For just $5, backers can receive lifelong use of the PocketMWD app. Physicians can use the MWD Health Manager for $99, which includes connections to an unlimited number of patients. There is also a $5,000 perk for hospitals, home care organizations and health care facilities; this consists a fully branded app installation on the facility’s server.

insulin injections.

started as a self-care solution became a passion for promoting diabetes
awareness and providing the best possible software solution for managing
any long-term condition,” Fred said. Using
the MWD Health Manager iEHR, patients always
have access to their data , simplify medication procedures and establish
communications with doctors and health centers. All data stored and
communications are secure; doctors
can monitor a patient’s progress only after being authorized by the patient.“With this type of support system, the quality of life for patients with a chronic disease can be preserved or improved significantly, while at the same time making health care costs more predictable,” said Fred. “It will save lots of time and costs for all parties involved.”For additional information, visit the MWD Health Manager website, http://mwdhealthmanager.comFred can be reached directly at info/mwdhealthmanager.com
This
self-care software system is fully operative but has yet to be extensively
marketed. 
Fred is estimating that he’ll need about $250,000
to promote the MWD Health Manager to individuals, hospitals, home
care organizations, physicians and professional management teams all over
the world.
In order to generate this
capital, he has launched this Indiegogo campaign.
Donations of any amount are
welcome. For just $5, backers can receive lifelong use of the PocketMWD app.
Physicians can use the MWD Health Manager for $99, which includes connections
to an unlimited number of patients. There is also a $5,000 perk for hospitals, home
care organizations and health care facilities; this consists a fully branded
app installation on the facility’s server.

story:
*This campaign is using Flexible Funding. We will deliver the product even if the goal not reach.


** Open Source Now **

The extensions has gone open source. Please visit GitHub for more information.
https://github.com/digicrafts/Advertising-ANE


What is an AIR native extension?

"Native Extensions for Adobe AIR are code libraries that contain native code wrapped with an ActionScript API. Native extensions provide easy access to device-specific libraries and features that are not available in the built-in ActionScript classes. Examples of native extensions include making a mobile device vibrate, integrating ad-networks and in-app purchasing systems into your games, and using the iOS Game Center in your iOS games."

You can find more information from Adobe Developer Connection.

Universal Advertising AIR Native Extension

Beside selling your mobile apps or in-app-purchase. The best way to monetising your mobile apps is display advertisement inside your applications and games.

For those using Adobe AIR to developing application, you may found it is difficult to integrate the advertisement in your application. Although, there exist many different AIR native extension (ANE) which make the jobs done. But they may be difficult to use and leak of support, or have limited support on ads network.

So, we are going to create a ANE which supporting all major mobile system and popular adverting network ALL-IN-ONE ANE.

Highlighted Features

The Universal Advertising AIR native extension will include the following highlighted features:

  • Supporting Android/IOS/Kindle
  • Supporting major advertising network
  • Banner and interstitial ads
  • Auto orientation
  • Setting priority of each advertising network
  • Backfill ads with bitmap or external images
  • Simple API and minimal coding needed. 
  • Well written documentation

Supported Advertising Network

The current planned supporting network are list below:

  • AdMob
  • iAd (IOS only)
  • MillennialMedia
  • InMobi
  • Amazon Mobile Ads (Android/kindle only)
  • Static in house ads (via bitmap or external images)
  • Platform supporting via AdMob Mediation Networks

Additional Goals

If the fund go beyond the initial target, then we may use it for additional features. Some current considered additional features:
  • Support video ads
  • Support Samsung AdsHub
  • Additional Ads Network
  • More
We will conduct a survey of additional features you need in order we will confirm the additional goals we have.

Simple Coding

The basic coding for display a ads involve 2 steps. First, setup a AdSettings instance. Second, create and show the ads.

To create a AdSettings instance and add the adapter for each network. You can config each adapter instance separately .

To display a banner ads. First, you need to create a banner by getBanner() static method. Then, you can show immediately by show() or show it later on by the static methods showBanner(). You can specify the refresh time optionally.

Same as the banner ads. You need to create an interstitial ads first by getInterstitial() static method. Then, you can show immediately by show() or show it later on by the static methods showInterstitial(). Differ from banner ads, you can specify the frequency of showing the interstitial and how many time its show.

Our experiences

We are a development studio locate in Hong Kong which have near 10 years of experiences on developing differ project using Flash/AS. Also, we are developing and selling plugins use with several Adobe products.
In recent years, the explode of mobile trend, we start to use AIR for our main development tool. To deal with the challenges faced when using AIR for development. We need to create and use many ANE and this make us have the confident to make this project happen.
Company Website: http://www.digicrafts.com.hk/components
GitHub Website: https://github.com/digicrafts 

Risks & Challenges

We have many experiences in developing  different kind of ANE and have a deep knowledge on how to integrate different SDK. This make us know there exist many challenges when combine different SDK in one application, such as conflict in SDK library, SDK bug, etc. We may need a huge amount of time for debugging and make sure the ANE is stable enough to use in production environments.

Since we are a small company, we only have a limited resource can be allocated in this project. If the goal can reach earlier, we can have a better plan and allocate more resource on the project and make the product better.

FAQ

What's the expected release date?
We expected to ship the beta version at the end of September 2014. And we hope it will be release before mid-October if anything goes well.

How to download the product?

We will send each backer an email about the information on downloading the product. Most likely you will got an account and login to download your product.

How can i access the source code?

If you are a backer for source code license, we will send you the information for how to access the source code. We may host it on GitHub like cloud services for easy access.

story:
The campaign has now closed, but you can still donate to HRiC via the "Give Here" button on the right hand side of our website at www.humanrightsinchildbirth.com


What We Do

Human Rights in Childbirth works to promote the recognition of fundamental human rights in maternity care, both in law and practice. We connect individuals and organizations around the world who are advancing women’s rights in childbirth at a local level.  We create opportunities for collaboration at our conferences and other events.

Our international network of lawyers and activists works towards strategic advocacy, and the development of Know-Your-Rights information, for distribution at the state or national level.  With our network coordinators, we are developing education courses and materials to increase relevant knowledge among birth attendants,  legal professionals, and consumers.

Human Rights in Childbirth was formally established as a Dutch Stichting, or non-profit foundation, in 2013 (kvk number 58480609), and now has core team members working in both The Netherlands and Oregon in the US. 

Why Human Rights in Childbirth?

Everybody working in maternity care shares a common goal: healthy mothers and healthy babies.  Governments, NGOs, and providers are working around the world to ensure that every mother and baby survives birth.  But more is at stake in pregnancy and childbirth than survival alone.  When women are coming out of childbirth with post-partum PTSD due to disrespect or abuse during labour, the goal of a “healthy mother and healthy baby” has not been met.

The care that women receive during pregnancy and childbirth intersects with the human rights to physical integrity, self-determination, privacy, health, family life, and spiritual freedom.

Women do not lose their basic human rights once they become pregnant. And yet, every day, we receive reports from women around the globe that their human rights have been violated during childbirth. From denial of pain relief and support during labour to episiotomies, cesareans, and other interventions performed despite the mother’s objection.

Women should not be coerced into compliance, through threats that medical care will be completely withheld or that their children will be taken away by social services. Women should not have to travel across state and country borders to find support in childbirth. And doctors and midwives should not be persecuted for providing rights-based maternity care.

We believe that much suffering can be prevented through the clarification and upholding of the fundamental human rights of birthing women.  And we are committed to promoting those rights, in law and practice, until they become a reality for birthing women everywhere. 

Our Story


Our organization has grown out of the increasing concern of people – lawyers, doctors, ethicists, midwives, anthropologists, doulas, parents – from around the world, that there is a significant lack of recognition of the fundamental human right of birthing women to be respected as the final decision-maker about her own care and her baby’s care. 

The conversation about the range and recognition of human rights at stake began in The Hague in 2012, at our first conference.  It developed through two more conferences in 2013, in the US and Belgium.  Our next conference is planned for India, and will convene leaders of maternity care in the global community to determine how to eradicate inequality and ensure support for human rights in maternity care worldwide.

What Will My Contribution Fund?

Over the last three years, Hermine Hayes-Klein, Human Rights in Childbirth’s founder and program director, has led a committed team of volunteers to establish ou international networks of lawyers and activists, to put on three conferences that were attended by delegates from more than fifty countries, and to build a website that will act as a resource center for human rights in childbirth issues around the world.  

The first phase of HRiC’s development has been accomplished with no funding.  But the calls for help have grown to exceed our ability to handle on an all-volunteer basis. This campaign will fund Phase 2. We need $50,000 to establish HRiC as a sustainable non-profit organisation with a committed team able to advance our work to the next level.  Your pledge will contribute to HRiC projects, to our operational expenses, and also to consultation fees necessary to explore and secure the funding that will fuel our work for the long term.  

This work will lead the way towards dramatically better maternity care for families world-wide, through recognition of the improved outcomes for mothers and babies that follow from respectful, mother-centered, human-rights-based care.  Please support Human Rights in Childbirth to continue this vital work.

Why Crowd-Sourcing? 

We are building a global community of activists and legal advocates working to advance fundamental human rights in childbirth, and we want you to be part of it. By inviting the individuals and organizations who share our passion for woman-centered maternity care to help build our foundation, this campaign works to construct and reinforce the engaged international community that will ultimately make our mission succeed. With your contribution, you become a founder of this movement, not only financially, but personally.

The “thank you gifts” on the side of this page are an expression of that mutual engagement and also work to connect us personally as we move forward together to transform maternity care.

We are Grateful

We have already received much support during the last three years, from the many people who have volunteered their time to transform HRiC from a conference into a movement.  We would never have made it this far without each of you. Thank you.

We are also honored and excited to be supported by the heroes on our advisory board, who are all passionate advocates for improving childbirth: 

Amali Lokugamage

Debra Pascali-Bonaro

Ina May Gaskin

Jennie Joseph

Robin Lim

Robbie Davis Floyd

Sarah Buckley 

We thank you for your support and guidance from the bottom of our hearts.

We would also like to thank Britt Myren for producing our Indiegogo videos and all of the amazing people who appear our Indiegogo campaign video above.

How Can I Help?

We are counting on your financial support to move forward. We are also very grateful for your help in spreading the word about this campaign. Please – Share, Share, Share!

With warmth, love, and thanks for your support, 

Hermine, Roanna, Nicola, Paola, Britt, and the Human Rights in Childbirth Team

NOTE: ARE YOU GETTING AN ERROR MESSAGE WHEN YOU TRY TO DONATE?  Please contact us at support@humanrightsinchildbirth.com.  Or contact your bank, which can clear any restrictions for Indiegogo.

story:
Short Summary

Hi there,

Chana and Tova, two nurses, were seeking to help underprivileged communities when they stumbled upon Midwives for Haiti. Midwives for Haiti is an outstanding organization that trains local Haitians to become skilled birth attendants, helps staff the maternity center at the nearby hospital and manages a mobile clinic that provides pre-and post-natal care in 19 different locations.

At the hospital, running water becomes intermittent, and there is a severe shortage of basic materials, as well as limited electricity, which makes it difficult to provide care. There are neonatal deaths and high-risk mothers on a regular basis. There is very little oxygen available in the hospital. There are no means to save premature babies. Some weeks, between 2 and 6 babies die, mostly from prematurity but sometimes from other causes.

We just had to go. 

How You Can Help

Basically, we could really use your donation (Please?). 

We need to cover the cost of our tickets to and from Haiti, the 3-hour drive from the airport in Port-au-Prince to Hinche (on a dirt road!) where the hospital is located, room and board, our own supplies, and translators to help us communicate with the local women and midwives.

The $4,000 price tag covers the minimum essentials, but extra funds will go toward direly needed basic supplies and medications that we will purchase and bring with us, such as gloves, hand sanitizer, thermometers, Tylenol, batteries, etc.

We have a longer list of supplies needed in Haiti. If you are in a position to make a supply donation, please contact us directly at chanalewis@gmail.com.

Any amount is tremenously appreciated. Even a little goes a long way.

Other Ways You Can Help

If money isn't your thing, please help us get the word out and make some noise. Pass this along and/or share on Facebook with people who may be in a position to help financially.

And that’s all there is to it.

 

Thank you so much,

Chana and Tova

story:
My Story 

My name is Gabriel Hochberg and I am an 11 year old eco-preneur. I am excited about starting my new business ~ Hinoki Bath Be-Bags ™. My first business was a non-profit http://treesforhumanity.org which I started with my father in 2006. The mission is to teach and connect children globally to care about, protect, and plant trees as a way of offsetting the impact of global warming and climate change.

Also, I am part of the Entrepreneurship Club (eClub) at the Robert Muller School ~ Center for Living Ethics. In the eClub we are learning the art and skills of entrepreneurship and how to create socially-conscious and eco-friendly businesses.

I created this campaign for three reasons: To teach people about the healing properties of Hinoki wood for their health and well being, to recycle the Hinoki wood that is being wasted in the manufacturing process of temples and wooden soaking baths in Japan, and to learn more about becoming a successful entrepreneur!

About Hinoki

The Japanese have known for centuries of the relaxing, calming & healing properties of Hinoki wood.  All of the temples in Japan are constructed of Hinoki wood as well as the (Ofuros) soaking tubs. It is used in essential oils for healing and in health care products.  Oils in the bark produce phytocide properties for healing including: creating a calmative effect, relieving insomnia, eliminating parasites, and killing viruses, Candida, and invasive bacteria. The product is environmentally friendly ~ specially crafted from the recovered by-product of the Hinoki wood manufacturing process. It is 100% natural and made in Japan.

The Impact & Product

My goal is to help as many people as possible to learn about using Hinoki as a natural and holistic product for health issues, especially for reducing stress and insomnia. This approach is natural and much better than using synthetic medications.  The Hinoki bath ~ Be-Bags ™ can help relieve stress and insomnia by either sleeping with a bag under your pillow case or using it in a bath. Each Be-Bag can be used for 4 baths.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm seeking $3,000 in funding to help cover the cost of the initial inventory of the Hinoki Bath Be-Bags. Whatever funds I raise will go towards these costs. The perks are listed to the right. You can view our cool, Trees for Humanity, tie-dyed t-shirts in the (Files-link) in our Gallery/ 3.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute financially, please help get the word out and make some noise for me. Tell your friends, family, community, and use the Indiegogo share tools below. Thank you! <3
