story:
No More Armpits spots. Give sweat the middle finger!

KILL THE SMELL

STOP STINKING

REFRESHES

Receive Aroma Therapy As You Wipe Your Entire Body Clean

PORTABLE DESIGN THAT FITS IN ANY BAG & POCKET

SHOWER EVERYWHERE YOU GO

SAVE TIME. SAVE WATER. 

DON’T SWEAT IT.

FEATURED ON

FRESH SCENTS

INGREDIENTS

3 MASSIVE WET TOWELS - 30x80cm (31,5") EACH

SIZE MATTERS

A BONUS ADDED TO EACH PERK

NOW FEATURING  "SweatGO” BOX OF 5

 

  • PORTABLE
  • DISCREET
  • DEODORANT (DOESN’T BLOCK SKIN PORES)
  • SPORT/EXCLUSIVE DESIGN
  • AIRPORT-Friendly.
  • 5 IN 1 BOX

The SweatGO Box consists of 5 deodorizing wipes, which can easily fit in your pocket or luggage. One BIG advantage of SweatGO - you can bring it along everywhere you go. Ever got your deodorant confiscated at the Airport's metal detection security area? Decompressed air cans/aerosols are prohibited on hand luggage. With SweatGO, you can forget that concern. YOU can now bring along your Portable deodorant in the form of wipe anytime and anywhere you travel.

A Message from the Founders of ShowerGO

     

     

    CAUTIOUS ABOUT THE ENVIRONMENT & SOCIETY


    Existing research shows that a person on average uses nearly 65,1 liters of water per shower taken. At ShowerGo, we are concerned for the reckless amount of water usage, but also take into consideration the unhealthy and dangerous chemicals that go down the sewerage. We encourage people to use our wipes even when they are at home as 1 ShowerGO package of wipes consists of only 120 ml of liquid, which is roughly 0,03 % of the amount of water that a person uses on average to take a shower. It’s simple mathematics!

     

    THE PERKS

    SPECIAL PERK

    THE ENTREPRENEUR

    • CUSTOMIZED PERSONAL LOGO/BRANDING FEATURE
    • DISCOUNT PRICE
    • DELIVERY INCLUDED

    Order now you very own personalized ShowerGO wipes. We will put your own logo and/or slogan right on the package front. Be the first on the market!

    STRETCH GOALS

    Manufacture and deliver the products

    Make the products Biodegradable

    Obtain Antibacterial License (As that costs money)

    Create a new product ShowerGO PET
     

    ABOUT US

    While traveling to different countries, ShowerGO founder, Kiril Tsilkov, couldn’t stop sweating like a pig (in a van). It was the summer of 2015. Meteorologists say it was one of the hottest summers in years (but they always say that). Kiril was out on the streets, working relentlessly, trying to make a top sale of his new products. The approach undertaken was direct sales. That involved him being at a hundred different locations each day, sweating in a suit. Ideally, if it was up to him, he would wear short pants and a t-shirt but his mission wouldn’t allow him. He was riding in his old panel van from 1999, where high-end innovations, such as air conditioning didn’t exist. He traveled in something like a mobile sauna. There were numerous occasions where he wouldn’t attend a meeting as he would be completely messy, stinky and smelly, which made him look unprofessional, and frankly, like a foul creature from the Great Below.

     Kiril had a problem. A problem experienced by millions of people around the globe. Nobody was doing anything about.

    Then it him. What if he reverse engineered the process of taking a shower? People would finally be able to shower on the GO and will no longer have to last another second of being sweaty and stinky.

    He had a meeting with his parents who have been running a successful cosmetic company for the last 20 years. For days, they were trying to come up with the best possible solution. After months and countless experiments with different formulas, they finally got the desired results. A MASSIVE 30x80cm NON-WOVEN TOWEL impregnated with uniquely selected showering ingredients. ShowerGO was born.

    Today, Kiril is like "No Sweat" Steve - no matter the situation, he just DOESN'T SWEAT IT.

     

    THE TEAM

    FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING

    WE DELIVER AT YOUR FEET

    F.A.Q

    Are there any products like this available?

    Currently, we are the only company that offers a resalable package of 3 Massive Body cleaning wipes. Furthermore, there is no product that consists of menthol and the deodorant substance. Other related products are very expensive and come closely to the same price for only 1 wipe.

    How Big is one wipe?

    Our wipes are 30cm x 80cm (11,8x31,49 inches) which is more than enough to clean your entire body plus you get the extra feature of reaching your own back.

    What type of material are the wipes made off?

    The wipes are made off high quality non-woven material. They are almost impossible to break unless you possess some sort of super powers.

    Who can use ShowerGO?

    ShowerGO is intended for people who have an active type of lifestyle who simply cannot afford the discomfort of being sweaty and stinky.

    How many wipes are in one package?

    A ShowerGO package consists of 3 Massive Wipes. 1 wipe can sufficiently clean your entire body and ensure that is hygienically maintained.

    Do you ship to my country?

    We are currently shipping globally. This means that you can currently be located at the other end of the world and we will still be able to deliver to you.

    What are the main ShowerGO ingredients?

    The main ingredients of our ShowerGO wipes are Menthol, Aloe Vera and the Natural Deodorant Substance. The menthol provides a cooling off effect, which is especially applicable in the hot summer days or after staying active. The Aloe Vera is great for your skin as it maintains it soft and gentle. The Organic and Eco-friendly deodorant substance neutralizes the stinky smell of sweat and keeps your body protected for the next 24 hours.

    What are the products that you offer?

    We currently offer 3 types of ShowerGO MASSIVE BODY cleaning wipes: MEN, LADIES & BATH. Our 4th product is the SweatGO portable box for discreet and healthy cleaning of your sweat everywhere you GO.

    What’s the shelf life of ShowerGO?

    Our ShowerGO products have been checked for quality sealing and ensure a promising shelf life of over 2 years.  Even when you need to use only 1 wipe, make sure to carefully seal the package back on. In that way, so the rest of the wipes won’t dry off.

story:
Hi guys,

First of all, I'd like to thank each and everyone of you who contributed to my previous campaign. It has helped me tremendously towards solving a medical issue that I have struggled with for almost three years now.

Sadly, the treatment is costing more than previously anticipated.

That's why I am asking for your help. Any amount matters; bringing me closer to reaching this goal and finally solving a medical issue that is far from minor.

Thank you so much,

Cristian

story:
ENDURANCE RECOVERY PROTEIN POWDER

Fastest Mixing and Amazing Taste
 

 

 

ATHLETE TESTED, ATHLETE APPROVED 

We’ve been helping athletes achieve optimal muscle performance for years! All of our Amazon reviews are 5-Star:

“Before using Physiophyx LPR I could really feel my hard workouts the next day or even for a few days, but now that I regularly drink LPR that feeling has pretty much vanished to the point where I can easily recover from two workouts if I need. This product is at at really high level and the quality is outstanding!” - Maria Petzold, August 2018

“After my runs I have faster recovery and I'm ready for my workout the next day!” - John, April 2018

“I've used just about all the recovery drinks on the market, and this is the best I've found overall. GREAT TASTE, easy to mix, easy to digest, and really seems to WORK. I take this after a hard run or ride, and I recover well and am able to hit harder workouts with greater frequency. I've also used this during mid to long range endurance efforts and it's proven to perform there as well. I love the quick energy of the carbs, and I'm a believer of the carb + protein + amino acid recovery science.” - Pat M., October 2016

“I am in love with this product. I'd like to stop at that and not write anything else. But hear me out. For the longest time it was hard for me to find something that is easy to digest and has a very clean and satisfying flavor. When you train you constantly consume loads of prepackaged energy or recovery or protein. Your GI system becomes quite sensitive. I have recently seen a guy carrying a bottle of honey with him on the run because he wanted something not processed. PhysioPhyx is a better solution. Delivers amazing flavor and is great on my gut. This is the only product that I let my son consume for swim training. Try it - I am 100% sure you gonna like it.” - Maciej Kurka, November 2016

 

 

Support Your Active and Healthy Lifestyle

PhysioPhyx LPR is a high quality post workout meal replacement to fuel and support healthy and active lifestyles of women and men looking to achieve lean muscle gains and fitness goals. by letting you give it all you got, crush your workout, shred muscle, get stronger, faster and more powerful. 

At its’ core, optimal athletic performance boils down to optimal muscle performance. Science-based, athlete tested PhysioPhyx LPR is an All-Natural Muscle Builder and Recovery Drink that is uniquely formulated to support your hard working muscles by increasing muscle synthesis (repair and growth) by up to 33%, increasing carbohydrate utilization by up to 65%, improving hydration and fluid absorption, minimizing muscle damage, accelerating muscle recovery and optimizing training induced adaptations. 

Powered by a simple, clean, safe, straightforward blend of High-Octane Carbs, Fast-Acting Whey Protein Isolate and Leucine, PhysioPhyx LPR delivers the fuel your muscles need to go the distance today and the critical building blocks they need to do it all over again tomorrow. Don't leave your athletic performance to blind luck...Get Your Phyx!

 

Key Product Features

 

MAXIMUM ENERGY AND PERFORMANCE - Less downtime, more training. Workout harder and longer and burn fat rapidly with high intensity workouts.

PROTEIN - Contains All-Natural Grass Fed Whey Protein Isolate. High Quality Complete Protein that is the easiest-to-digest and has the highest biological value of all proteins. Provides the critical building blocks to repair and build muscle.

LEUCINE - Stimulates muscle synthesis. Allows your body to utilize every last ounce of protein for muscle growth and repair. When co-ingested with protein, may increase muscle synthesis by up to 33%.

TRAINING - Optimize training by repairing muscles and rapidly restoring energy.

NATURAL - Made with only All-Natural, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Hormone-Free, Antibiotic-Free ingredients. 3rd party tested for potency and purity. No dangerous stimulants. 100% label transparency. Free of soy, maltodextrin, artificial sweeteners, colors, flavors or preservatives.

 

 

Our Story

My name is Tony Miller. Fitness is important to me. My ability to recover between workouts is critical if I want to achieve performance gains. 

I've tried all the recovery products and talked to many athletes who are frustrated and unsatisfied by other products.

Athletes need something better so I made it. I've been testing PhysioPhyx on athletes and they keep coming back for more because it's what athletes asked for! There isn't a recovery drink that tastes, mixes or performs better!

Whether you're training, competing or adventuring, the journey is fun and the experience should be enhanced, not diminished by a recovery drink.

 

 

 

PhysioPhyx LPR:

  • Great Taste and Incredibly Refreshing
  • Easy to Mix - Use It Anywhere
  • Smooth, Light Consistency
  • Easy to Digest
  • Precisely Designed to Provide Ultra-Clean Energy and Speed Muscle Repair

 

Competition:

  • Clumpy Consistency
  • Chalky Taste
  • Requires Blender and Masking Agents 
  • Hard to Digest
  • No Ability to Come Back Stronger

 

     

     

    • All-Natural
    • Gluten-Free
    • Non-GMO
    • Hormone-Free
    • Caffeine-Free
    • Made in the USA
    • Free of impurities and pixie dust
    • Third party tested to ensure ingredient purity
    • Made in an NSF Certified for Sport facility to ensure strict adherence to FDA mandated Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP's)
    • Made with whey protein isolate from grass-fed cows

     

     

    It's Time to Share the Secret!

    By participating in this campaign, you're helping yourself and other athletes say YES to smooth, light consistency, easy mixability, refreshing, amazing taste, and superior performance...and say NO to unimaginative, bland, clumpy products that require expensive mixing tools and masking agents. Imagine how difficult it is for your digestive system to absorb a product if you can’t stir or shake it up in a bottle.  

      Funding will be used to improve our existing and future product lineup  to include plant-based proteins, more electrolytes, more flavors so you have the nutritional tools you want!

story:
INTRODUCING SNOW LEOPARD SPORTS

Snow Leopard Sports is the ONLY producer of heated batting gloves for elite
baseball players in cold climates. Designed using the newest custom heating fabric
technologies, Snow Leopard products can safely and comfortably heat up to high
temperatures with no bulky batteries or heating packs. Our goal is to keep athletes
at peak performance and comfort, no matter the temperature. Our products
are designed and created by elite baseball players familiar with the struggles
of staying warm and loose while playing ball in cold temperatures.

What We Need & What You Get

Project Timeline

FAQs

How are the Nooky Signature Boxes different from the Nooky Subscription Boxes?

We’re launching our Signature line with this campaign, which includes eight curated collections (with more added as stretch goals!) that’ll be consistently available for purchase via our website. In contrast, subscriptions ship every three months and the contents are a surprise each quarter.

Will I still receive my perk Signature Box if you don't meet your funding goal?

Yes! We are committed to keeping our promises to our backers. We chose a flexible funding goal, and are confident in our capacity to fulfill all rewards even if the unthinkable happens, and we don't quite meet our goal.

Will my Nooky Box be shipped discreetly?

Of course. The packaging we use is completely discreet so that only you will be aware of the exciting experience that awaits inside each box.

What are the shipping charges and where do you ship?

For pledges under $125, shipping is calculated based on weight and location. All pledges above $125 include FREE shipping.

We ship to the United States and Canada; at this time we do not ship internationally.

Can I back this project anonymously?

Yes, IndieGoGo allows the option to donate money to a project without including your contact information. When you’re ready to make your donation, check the box that says “Don’t display my name on the campaign page.”

I’ve only used my [sexytimes product] once, can I return it?

So sorry, once it’s touched your box (or any other area), it can’t go back into its box. We’ll ship a replacement for defective products, but otherwise all sales are final.

But what if I haven’t opened my product and it’s still in the original packaging? Can I return it then?

Nope, all sales really are final. If you can’t make that toy your best friend, share the love and give it to your best friend!

How about refunds?

If there is an issue with your order or account, we would be happy to help you resolve the situation which may include a refund in certain scenarios. However, we do not offer refunds once the products have been received.

I’m a little nervous… or new… or… is this going to be too much for me?

Being a bit nervous is totally natural. Everyone comes to The Nooky Box with different levels of experience and comfort. We’ve curated each box so you can feel confident in the experience as a whole. All of our boxes are appropriate for beginner-level sexploration, but the toys are advanced enough to please even the most seasoned veterans.

Can I buy for someone else?

Absolutely! Signature boxes make excellent (and seductive) gifts.

I’m single; can I still get in on the Nooky action?

We certainly think so! Other folks are fun to play with, but being single doesn’t need to be a barrier to pleasure. Many of our collections and featured toys are amazing for solo play as well as with a partner. Here at The Nooky Box we strongly encourage all folks to get curious about their own intimate terrain. Knowledge is power, after all, and you’ll be a much more informed guide the next time you do have a playmate.

Do you take requests?

We like to consider ourselves good, giving and game. At the very least, we’re always open to suggestions. If you have a great one, we’d love to try and work out the logistics to make it happen. Drop us a line to see what we can do about making your fantasy a reality!

Thank you!

Your support matters; we appreciate every dollar donated, every post shared, and every positive word offered on this project we hold so dear to our hearts. Empowered sexuality is our passion, and we’re thrilled you’re willing to join us on that mission.

story:
ComePlayDetroit (CPD) is the fastest growing sport and social club in Detroit. Focused on the retention and attraction of young talent to Detroit, we realize the importance of having opportunities for social and active lifestyles. 

CPD has been organizing intramural leagues and hosting social events for nearly three years, including softball, volleyball, basketball, bowling, tennis, flag football, broomball, as well as Dodgeball in the D, an attempt at the World Record for the Largest Dodgeball Game Ever, and recently hosting the Detroit Lions Half-Time Show.

One of the biggest challenges that the community faces is the lack of places for people to go and be active. CPD saw the need, and decided to do something about it by opening up it's first physical space! The CPD Fitness Studio is conveniently located only blocks from The Fox Theater, Comerica Park and Ford Field, one block from the Grand Circus People Mover station, and has 6 major high rise buildings within walking distance.

The space has already been built out, but we still need a few more things to complete the studio. The $15,000 will go towards putting up mirrors, new lighting, and other finishing touches that will make this the best space that is able to provide for the needs of the growing community of young adults taht demand an active and social lifestyle.

ComePlayDetroit was started with zero budget and a website that was put together in-kind back in 2010. Since then we have engaged thousands of people and have clearly begun to have a major impact on the city of Detroit. Recently we have heard from people that they would like opportunities that didn't involve sports and throwing balls at each other. Now that we are opening up our first physical space, the ComePlayDetroit Fitness Studio, we have answered the call and are excited to continue to provide the growing community of young adults in Detroit what they demand, a variety of opportunities to live a dynamic lifestyle that includes active and social experiences. 

We have received in-kind sponsorships with KIND snacks and VitaminWater to provide free products to everyone that attends our classes. With your support, we can take this great space that we have and begin providing consistent programing to fulfill the needs of the community. ComePlayDetroit provides the PLAY in Live, Work & Play!

Thank you for your support.

ComePlayDetroit (CPD) is the fastest growing sport and social club in Detroit. Focused on the retention and attraction of young talent to Detroit, we realize the importance of having opportunities for social and active lifestyles. 
CPD has been organizing intramural leagues and hosting social events for nearly three years, including softball, volleyball, basketball, bowling, tennis, flag football, broomball, as well as Dodgeball in the D, an attempt at the World Record for the Largest Dodgeball Game Ever, and recently hosting the Detroit Lions Half-Time Show.
One of the biggest challenges that the community faces is the lack of places for people to go and be active. CPD saw the need, and decided to do something about it by opening up it's first physical space! The CPD Fitness Studio is conveniently located only blocks from The Fox Theater, Comerica Park and Ford Field, one block from the Grand Circus People Mover station, and has 6 major high rise buildings within walking distance.
The space has already been built out, but we still need a few more things to complete the studio. The $15,000 will go towards putting up mirrors, new lighting, and other finishing touches that will make this the best space that is able to provide for the needs of the growing community of young adults taht demand an active and social lifestyle.
ComePlayDetroit was started with zero budget and a website that was put together in-kind back in 2010. Since then we have engaged thousands of people and have clearly begun to have a major impact on the city of Detroit. Recently we have heard from people that they would like opportunities that didn't involve sports and throwing balls at each other. Now that we are opening up our first physical space, the ComePlayDetroit Fitness Studio, we have answered the call and are excited to continue to provide the growing community of young adults in Detroit what they demand, a variety of opportunities to live a dynamic lifestyle that includes active and social experiences. 
We have received in-kind sponsorships with KIND snacks and VitaminWater to provide free products to everyone that attends our classes. With your support, we can take this great space that we have and begin providing consistent programing to fulfill the needs of the community. ComePlayDetroit provides the PLAY in Live, Work & Play!
Thank you for your support.

story:
FOREO CONCEPTUALIZED WHAT THE ORIGINAL ELECTRIC TOOTHBRUSH SHOULD HAVE BEEN FROM THE VERY START – INTRODUCING THE ISSA™

Imagine an electric toothbrush with brush heads that are so durable they last for one whole year while remaining gentle, hygienic and effective. Imagine an electric toothbrush that holds a charge for so long, worrying about it losing power in the middle of a holiday will never cross your mind again. The ISSA™ originally designed as an at home dental solution for whitening and polishing merges never-before-accomplished functionality by integrating sophisticated WhiteTooth™ technology into its design, bringing incredible cleaning, polishing and whitening capabilities, and leaving all other electric toothbrushes in the dust. Bringing in a new era of dental care, the ISSA™ will be the first name on everyone’s lips when they think about the future of electric toothbrushes.

AWARDS

The ISSA™ has won a 2014 Silver A’Design Award for Beauty, Personal Care and Cosmetic Product Design. The Silver A' Design Award is a prestigious award given to products that have attained an exemplary level of perfection in design.

BE AMONG THE FIRST IN THE WORLD TO EXPERIENCE THE AMAZING EFFECTS OF THE ISSA™

Be one of the first to join FOREO’s Dental Revolution! Purchase an ISSA™ today and receive your order months before the commercial launch!

Early Bird version, available for a limited time only. FOREO is offering an Indiegogo exclusive discount for our Early Bird ISSA™ and ISSA™ mini Project Supporters. For those who want to get their hands on an ISSA™ model at a reduced cost, this one-time offer is not to be missed!

The ISSA™ First Edition is full-sized and suitable for adults, the ISSA™ mini First Edition is for children 8 years and older. 

                                         

SUPPORT OUR ISSA™ PROJECT AND RECEIVE THE FOLLOWING PERKS:

WHY WE WANT TO REVOLUTIONIZE DAILY DENTAL CARE

There were high hopes for the electric toothbrush when it was created in 1954. It was expected to change daily dental care with an easier, more effective way to care for the teeth. Yet the electric toothbrush never converted consumers. Despite billions of dollars spent on marketing efforts, only 31% of Americans have switched over to the electric toothbrush! Though the electric toothbrush fell short of its expectations, the design, and therefore its performance, has not significantly improved since its creation. It’s time for a change.


REVOLUTIONARY SOLUTIONS THAT OFFER INNOVATION IN 3 MAIN AREAS

FOREO has conceptualized what the original electric toothbrush should have been right from the very start - by designing the entire concept from scratch focusing on 3 main areas of innovation.

NEW MATERIAL

· Soft and flexible silicone is completely nonabrasive to make it impossible to apply too much pressure, preventing gum recession and sensitivity in teeth, both of which are the most common dental issues

· Silicone is nonporous so it doesn’t absorb any microbes for hygienic bristles

· Silicone bristles combined with high-intensity pulsations provide ultra-gentle yet effective dental care

NEW FORM

· Far more durable than standard electric toothbrushes, requires no replacement brush heads for 1 year

· Integrated battery lasts an astonishing 365 uses per each full charge and only takes 1 hour to fully charge

· Compact, lightweight and easy to take on your travels

· Vibrant and visually appealing design

NEW FUNCTIONALITY

·  Silicone bristles clean plaque in a completely different way that eliminates the issue of finding optimal pressure; these bristles use friction instead of a scratching action to effectively remove bio-film and other impurities from the mouth

·  Longer and wider brush head covers much more surface area with every stroke

·  Bi-directional brush bristle design makes it possible to clean efficiently between the teeth

·  3D flexibility in the ergonomic brush head adapts to any tooth surface and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice

THE ISSA™ RANGE 

ISSA™

The ISSA™’s 8-speed interface allows users to customize the frequency of pulsations to suit their sensitivity requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different quadrant of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. The ISSA™ lasts up to 365 uses per full charge. Brush heads need to be replaced only once yearly, at a cost of $15 each.

ISSA™ mini

The child-friendly ISSA™ mini has all of the benefits of the ISSA™, with the added addition of parental controls to ensure twice-daily brushings. If the user has not brushed for over 12 hours, the sad face will appear while the happy face will light up after the user has brushed for 2 minutes. The ISSA™ mini has 2 speeds and lasts up to 200 uses per full charge. Brush heads need to be replaced only once yearly, at a cost of $15 each.

  

ISSA™ Luxe

For those wanting to indulge in the epitome of opulence, the Limited Edition ISSA™ Luxe range is for you. The ISSA™ Gold has an 18-karat gold base and comes in Royal Purple, and the Limited Edition ISSA™ Platinum has a solid platinum base and comes in Black, making these ultra-exclusive items the ultimate luxury accessory.

SPECIFICATIONS

With the ISSA™ weighing 59 grams and the ISSA™ mini weighing 49 grams, the electric toothbrushes in the ISSA™ range are less than half the weight of competing models, which can weigh up to 130 grams.

THE EVOLUTION OF THE ISSA™ 

                       

ABOUT THE FOREO INSTITUTE AND OUR TEAM 

The FOREO Institute consists of multidisciplinary specialists who are passionate about creative innovation and cutting-edge solutions. We’ve already revolutionized the beauty industry by introducing our LUNA™ range of skincare devices, and now we are offering another groundbreaking innovation to defy the existing norms within the dental industry - the ISSA™. 

FOREO'S LUNA™ RANGE OF SKINCARE DEVICES

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

Because FOREO believes that nothing is impossible with collaborative creation, today we present our ISSA™ project on Indiegogo; we want you to get involved in our project and be a part the process before it is available on a commercial level. The FOREO Institute is open and waiting for you to join in and support our project to see the ISSA™ revolutionize the dental industry! 

PROJECT TIMELINE

PROJECT STATUS

For the latest and most up to date information on the current status of the ISSA™ project, including internal testing results and insights be sure to check out our updates section. 

FAQ

How do the ISSA™ devices work?

Through a combination of high-intensity pulsations channeled through soft and flexible silicone bristles, ISSA™ devices effectively clean teeth and remove stains while the gentle message function stimulates blood flow on gums, leading to healthier gums and preventing gum disease.

What will the prices for the ISSA™ and ISSA™ mini be when they go on general sale?

The ISSA™ will be $199 USD, the ISSA™ mini will be $119 USD and the replacement brush heads will be $15 USD.

How often do I need to change my ISSA™ device’s brush head?

The ISSA™’s and ISSA™ mini brush head lasts for 1 year.

What clinical studies have been done to verify the effectiveness of the ISSA™ range?

The devices have undergone extensive internal testing, clinical trials are scheduled to begin in June with results and statistics available after the commercial release.

Can the devices be used with a homemade tooth powder?

Yes, ISSA™ devices are suitable to use with any toothpaste, tooth polish or other tooth-cleaning products.

How do I clean my ISSA™ product?

Wash the brush surfaces with soap and water, rinse with clean water and pat dry with a lint-free cloth or towel.

Can the ISSA™ range be placed in UV sanitation cases like other toothbrushes?

Placing ISSA™ devices in UV sanitation cases is not necessary, as their silicone bristles resist bacteria buildup.

Can I use ISSA™ products if I have mouth ulcers, tooth decay, gum disease or any other oral conditions?

We suggest that anyone who suffers from a serious oral condition should consult their dental-care professional before using an ISSA™ device.

 Which ISSA™ models come with the 2-Year Limited Warranty and 10-Year Quality Guarantee?

All ISSA™ models available for purchase - the Early Bird ISSA™ and ISSA™ mini, the ISSA™ and ISSA™ mini Beta Versions, the ISSA™ and ISSA™ mini First Editions, and the Limited Editions ISSA™ Gold and ISSA™ Platinum - all come with the 2-Year Limited Warranty and 10-Year Quality Guarantee.

What is the 2-Year Limited Warranty and how is it different from the 10-Year Quality Guarantee?

The 2-Year Limited Warranty is valid up to 2 years after you acquire your ISSA™ product. Should there be a problem during this time, a free replacement can be claimed. If your proof of purchase has been misplaced or a problem is encountered with your ISSA™ product beyond the 2-Year Limited Warranty period but still within the 10-Year Quality Guarantee period, you will be given a 50% discount on your next FOREO product purchase.

story:
About my application

Hi!

My name is Aleksey Getman. And i would like to introduce you my iOs application called "Since I"

Have you ever wondered how many events happening every day in our lives? Except high-profile dates like birthday or wedding there are many interesting and nice things which happen constantly. And "Since I" helps you to save a piece of every event you like in your memory forever.

Why I need your help

The working version of the application is already available on appstore for Iphone 4/4s/5/5s. It is free and you may download it and try. 

But it still has bugs and problems. Also i'm going to improve its functional side. 

In plans:

  1. fix bugs
  2. add a general menu, where will be available to choose a language, turn on/off notifications, choose a color theme etc.
  3. add a "year" counter
  4. ability to replace a counter
  5. make the cover with camera from application
  6. notes for each event (small diary) - watch for screenshots with prototype
  7. geo tags for events
  8. iPad version
  9. advertising of app in social networks and blogs
But i have no funds for app improvement becouse i can't do all this by my own. I need a programmer and designer who need to be payed. 
Now you can fund a little to have ability for use the handy and useful tool for everyday life. Try the available version now. 


So I very hope for your help and understanding. 

Aleksey Getman

Founder of Since I app

story:
We are dying, Pollution is at an all time Extreme...

           Help is Near...

We like to think we are in control. We like to think of our homes as a bastion of safety. We, however, are deeply WRONG...

Everyday new refineries are being built. More coal burned. Traffic expecting to double. Steel at an all time high. Cattle growing exponentially. Pollution is set to become more devastating than ever... What can one family do??

INTRODUCING; A Prototype To Save Lives!

 

How does Children's Health First plan on saving millions? With a revolutionary new product that acts like an air purifier but is significantly more effective. Using a revolutionary technology to virtually ELIMINATE 90%+ of all indoor pollution. Not just large dust particles but DEADLY Infectous Diseases and VOC's (Volatile Organic Compounds.) Did you know cigarette smoke is invisible? But... if its invisible, why do we see huge clouds? Answer is VOC's. Yes that entire cloud consists of millions of Volatile Organic Compounds that reflect light to create the cloud. This scary negatively charged cloud sticks to anything positive charged (Children!) Making cigarette smoke one of our specialty test subjects!

It may seem slightly confusing but main point to consider is size of particles affecting our health see diagram below

     

 

Most important thing to take from this chart is the Effective range of most HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) systems. Notice that although they effectively remove 91% of elements larger than 3.0pm (paticulate matter.) They are completely worthless when helping with VOC's, infectious diseases, and problematic elements smaller than 3.0pm. Second, notice that a WHOOPING 99.57% of all airborne particles are smaller than effective range of 3.0pm. Whats this mean? That ridiculously expensive HVAC systems and HEPA filters do absolutely nothing to protect us against the VOC's and Infectous Diseases that are KILLING US!

 

Why are our health costs so outrageous?

Consider the previous chart. Air pollution affects every aspect of human civilization. If an individual has Asthma, how difficult can it be to exercise? If children miss school, school funding decreases. If your missing work, how can you provide for your family? If your hospitalized with Respiratory Symptoms, can you be an effective member of society? People are dying everyday from pollution and disease induced symptoms. This is causing our healthcare costs to explode. At moment NOTHING can help an individual who develops an extreme case of pollution poisoning.

Children's Health First believes an ounce of prevention is better than TONS of cure!

 

Phase 2 Begins Now!

Children's Health First is ecstatic to begin the next chapter in protecting the public!
Currently we are seeking donors to help make this product a reality. We have invested years and thousands of dollars to create the rough functioning product. After extensive testing the rough product blew away all of our expectations. Embaressing HEPA filter systems, Shaming HVAC systems, and these units ran from $700-$10,000 with filter replacements upwards of $1,000! (See Test Results Below)

 

 

Prototype Funding

Although we are very excited about results we have no intention of stopping there. Current prototype designs plan of improving functionality by 60%, efficiency by 30%, and air flow by 70%.

The prototype process will consist of 5 steps; Shell Design, Air Flow management, Filter Structure, Power Components, and additional elements (remote controlled, timer features.)

  • Shell Creation- Options Include; Aluminum, Plastic, Steel, Carbon Fibre and Fibre Glass 
  • Air Flow- This consists of 11 different Air Flow units. (Air flow importance; higher airflow more effective filtration but also higher cost)
  • Filter Structure- 9 Options and filter styles. (All filtration units currently use 1 filter, we plan on implementing a 2-4 filter set-up increasing functionality)
  • Power Components- Electrical aspects of this device will greatly determine overall effective filtration. We plan on wall mount, ceiling mount, stand alone. All will have different electrical aspects.
  • Additional Elements- Remote controlled aka ceiling units or wall mounts. Timer; auto on/off options. Color options. Fast filter reloading system.

Time Frame

All components have been identified and are ready for purchase and testing.

Week 1: Components ordered. Manufacturing area currently prepared to start assembly.

Month 1: 9-13 Various units in different configurations will be in assembly.

Month 2: Alpha Testing. Using a state of the art 3rd party testing facility such as Intertek in Signal Hill Long Beach. We will put all units in strict testing environments. These environments will punish the systems and inflict heavy concentrations of particulate matter. This will force the prototypes to filter out and survive some of the deadliest VOC's the world has to offer.

Month 3: Data compilation, review, and re-purpose. Here we will review tons of data acquired from previous tests. We will see which units worked most effective, which failed to live up to our expectations, and which parts that will help us help the world. We will then take the best of and...

Month 4: Prototypes Rebuilt. Using the previous data, pros and cons, we will then take the best of elements and make 4-5 Beta Prototypes

Month 5: Beta Prototype Testing. The new reconfigured units will then undergo same thorough testing as done before.

Month 6: Master Prototypes and Master Prototype Testing. These units will benefit from 2 stages of testing and after 3rd assembly will comprise of components most effective. Third stage of testing begins.

Month 7: Final Prototype and Cost Analysis. With results in hand from Master units we will be able to decipher costs and production values for the Final Prototype. Our goal is to have unit Retail for between $400-$1,200 depending on style.

Phase 3

This is Children's Health First ultimate goal. A unit in every school, work place, hospital, prenatal room, and most importantly the bedroom. With Prototype in hand we will then start second campaign to raise funding to go into full production! We will then lobby across the nation to create a new standard for indoor pollution. It is our dream to have Governments back this project and offer rebates/incentives to families, schools, and businesses that adopt this technology.

Test Results

We have done extensive testing on this proven Electronic Polarized Field Technology. The data consists of many pages of documents and studies. Too much to post in fact. To see test results send request to

drew@ChildrensHealthFIRST.org

we will reply promptly =)

Who Are We?

Children's Health First is an organization dedicated to enhancing the health of all families. We have been active in the community and environmental justice field for past 23years. We are currently in process of redeveloping our website and adding an extensive air pollution monitoring system in City of Wilmington, CA. The Port of Los Angeles and many other refineries including Tesoro, Conoco Phillips and others have made this city a melting pot of pollution sources. This new and amazing system will give real time data about refineries or areas in city affected by pollution. Even give off warnings to local residents about high hazaradous situations.

Director of Research  Drew Wood

 19 years Children's Environmental Exposure Reasearch. 14 years Asthma Intervention Program Success. Member of Coaltion for A Safe Environment for 3 years. Advocating for 9 years to the State of California for Safe, Clean, and Healthy Indoor Air. Home, School, and Childcare Healthy indoor specialist 17 years. Developing Test and Implementation programs for 4 Los Angeles area schools (public/private.) 10 year campaign interviewing over 80 Academic, Scientific, Medical, Federal, and State institutions relative to the health, and safety of indoor air quality. Worked 5 years in Water Treatment, Conditioning, Purification, and Streilization Industry.

President Alejandro Marquez

5 year Field and Operations Director Children's Health First. 9 years as Field Director for Coalition For A Safe Environment. President of Save The Burrowing Owl Committee. Assistant Director Save The Quality of Life Otay Mesa. University of Southern California Environmental Advocate Program member. Master Gardener (Organic Vegetables Rule!) Network Manager for City of Wilmington's Pollution Monitoring System. 7 year lobyist for Coalition For A Safe Environment. Professional Photographer and Videographer. City of Carson award for community activness. Environmentalist of The year award 2009.

 

Now The Fun Stuff.....PERKS

 

Kindle Fire HD 16gig 7" tablet

8gigabyte USB Drive

 

High Sierra Daypack

Organic Vegetable Examples

100% Organic Cotton T-Shirts

Using a revolutionary technology to virtually ELIMINATE 90%+ of all indoor pollution. Not just large dust particles but DEADLY Infectous Diseases and VOC's (Volatile Organic Compounds.) Did you know cigarette smoke is invisible? But... if its invisible, why do we see huge clouds? Answer is VOC's. Yes that entire cloud consists of millions of Volatile Organic Compounds that reflect light to create the cloud. This scary negatively charged cloud sticks to anything positive charged (Children!) Making cigarette smoke one of our specialty test subjects!
It may seem slightly confusing but main point to consider is size of particles affecting our health see diagram below
      
 
Most important thing to take from this chart is the Effective range of most HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) systems. Notice that although they effectively remove 91% of elements larger than 3.0pm (paticulate matter.) They are completely worthless when helping with VOC's, infectious diseases, and problematic elements smaller than 3.0pm. Second, notice that a WHOOPING 99.57% of all airborne particles are smaller than effective range of 3.0pm. Whats this mean? That ridiculously expensive HVAC systems and HEPA filters do absolutely nothing to protect us against the VOC's and Infectous Diseases that are KILLING US!
  
Why are our health costs so outrageous?
Consider the previous chart. Air pollution affects every aspect of human civilization. If an individual has Asthma, how difficult can it be to exercise? If children miss school, school funding decreases. If your missing work, how can you provide for your family? If your hospitalized with Respiratory Symptoms, can you be an effective member of society? People are dying everyday from pollution and disease induced symptoms. This is causing our healthcare costs to explode. At moment NOTHING can help an individual who develops an extreme case of pollution poisoning.
Children's Health First believes an ounce of prevention is better than TONS of cure!

 
Phase 2 Begins Now!
Children's Health First is ecstatic to begin the next chapter in protecting the public! Currently we are seeking donors to help make this product a reality. We have invested years and thousands of dollars to create the rough functioning product. After extensive testing the rough product blew away all of our expectations. Embaressing HEPA filter systems, Shaming HVAC systems, and these units ran from $700-$10,000 with filter replacements upwards of $1,000! (See Test Results Below)

 
 
Prototype Funding
Although we are very excited about results we have no intention of stopping there. Current prototype designs plan of improving functionality by 60%, efficiency by 30%, and air flow by 70%.
The prototype process will consist of 5 steps; Shell Design, Air Flow management, Filter Structure, Power Components, and additional elements (remote controlled, timer features.)

Shell Creation- Options Include; Aluminum, Plastic, Steel, Carbon Fibre and Fibre Glass 
Air Flow- This consists of 11 different Air Flow units. (Air flow importance; higher airflow more effective filtration but also higher cost)
Filter Structure- 9 Options and filter styles. (All filtration units currently use 1 filter, we plan on implementing a 2-4 filter set-up increasing functionality)
Power Components- Electrical aspects of this device will greatly determine overall effective filtration. We plan on wall mount, ceiling mount, stand alone. All will have different electrical aspects.
Additional Elements- Remote controlled aka ceiling units or wall mounts. Timer; auto on/off options. Color options. Fast filter reloading system.


Time Frame
All components have been identified and are ready for purchase and testing. 
Week 1: Components ordered. Manufacturing area currently prepared to start assembly.
Month 1: 9-13 Various units in different configurations will be in assembly.
Month 2: Alpha Testing. Using a state of the art 3rd party testing facility such as Intertek in Signal Hill Long Beach. We will put all units in strict testing environments. These environments will punish the systems and inflict heavy concentrations of particulate matter. This will force the prototypes to filter out and survive some of the deadliest VOC's the world has to offer.
Month 3: Data compilation, review, and re-purpose. Here we will review tons of data acquired from previous tests. We will see which units worked most effective, which failed to live up to our expectations, and which parts that will help us help the world. We will then take the best of and...
Month 4: Prototypes Rebuilt. Using the previous data, pros and cons, we will then take the best of elements and make 4-5 Beta Prototypes
Month 5: Beta Prototype Testing. The new reconfigured units will then undergo same thorough testing as done before.
Month 6: Master Prototypes and Master Prototype Testing. These units will benefit from 2 stages of testing and after 3rd assembly will comprise of components most effective. Third stage of testing begins.
Month 7: Final Prototype and Cost Analysis. With results in hand from Master units we will be able to decipher costs and production values for the Final Prototype. Our goal is to have unit Retail for between $400-$1,200 depending on style.

Phase 3
This is Children's Health First ultimate goal. A unit in every school, work place, hospital, prenatal room, and most importantly the bedroom. With Prototype in hand we will then start second campaign to raise funding to go into full production! We will then lobby across the nation to create a new standard for indoor pollution. It is our dream to have Governments back this project and offer rebates/incentives to families, schools, and businesses that adopt this technology.
Test Results
We have done extensive testing on this proven Electronic Polarized Field Technology. The data consists of many pages of documents and studies. Too much to post in fact. To see test results send request to
drew@ChildrensHealthFIRST.org
we will reply promptly =)
Who Are We?
Children's Health First is an organization dedicated to enhancing the health of all families. We have been active in the community and environmental justice field for past 23years. We are currently in process of redeveloping our website and adding an extensive air pollution monitoring system in City of Wilmington, CA. The Port of Los Angeles and many other refineries including Tesoro, Conoco Phillips and others have made this city a melting pot of pollution sources. This new and amazing system will give real time data about refineries or areas in city affected by pollution. Even give off warnings to local residents about high hazaradous situations.
Director of Research  Drew Wood
 19 years Children's Environmental Exposure Reasearch. 14 years Asthma Intervention Program Success. Member of Coaltion for A Safe Environment for 3 years. Advocating for 9 years to the State of California for Safe, Clean, and Healthy Indoor Air. Home, School, and Childcare Healthy indoor specialist 17 years. Developing Test and Implementation programs for 4 Los Angeles area schools (public/private.) 10 year campaign interviewing over 80 Academic, Scientific, Medical, Federal, and State institutions relative to the health, and safety of indoor air quality. Worked 5 years in Water Treatment, Conditioning, Purification, and Streilization Industry.
President Alejandro Marquez
5 year Field and Operations Director Children's Health First. 9 years as Field Director for Coalition For A Safe Environment. President of Save The Burrowing Owl Committee. Assistant Director Save The Quality of Life Otay Mesa. University of Southern California Environmental Advocate Program member. Master Gardener (Organic Vegetables Rule!) Network Manager for City of Wilmington's Pollution Monitoring System. 7 year lobyist for Coalition For A Safe Environment. Professional Photographer and Videographer. City of Carson award for community activness. Environmentalist of The year award 2009.
 
Now The Fun Stuff.....PERKS
 

Kindle Fire HD 16gig 7" tablet
8gigabyte USB Drive

 

High Sierra Daypack

Organic Vegetable Examples
100% Organic Cotton T-Shirts

story:
Kaka Multi Sensor Talking Orb, Simply, Useful and Beautiful.

KaKa is a revolutionary way to remind yourself about the most important tasks throughout the day, regardless of where you go or what you need to get done. It is a portable, ball-shaped voice recorder that allows you to store personalized messages and automatically activate them wherever you are, according to your specific needs. Record any message up to 60 seconds long, and play it back with high definition audio as a reminder to yourself, a message to someone else, or even a bedtime story for your kids while you are away. 

KaKa is as beautiful as it is functional. At only 65mm in diameter, it is totally portable, and comes equipped with blue and red LED light indicators. Upon pressing record, KaKa will begin blinking with a red LED light, which will last for up to 60 seconds before the recording is stopped. During playback, a blue LED light is activated, making KaKa beautiful and decorative to use. It looks like it comes from the future, and will be equally at home among professionals or casual users. The battery lasts around five days with typical use, and can be recharged through a micro USB cable.  

                                                         


The sensors in KaKa can be activated in four different ways: through motion, voice, vibration, or light. The possible uses are endless. 


•Use KaKa’s magnetic touch points to fix the orb near a dangerous spot like a wet floor. KaKa’s motion sensor will activate it whenever someone walks by, audibly warning them of the situation and preventing an injury. An ambient warning is much more effective than a simple sign, which can easily go unseen. 

•entrance to greet important guests with information they need to know. KaKa enhances your Place it on your desk at the office to provide audio playback of an important note, or at an ability to communicate, act a security alarm when intruders are present, or even as a “smart” doorbell.

•Place it in a box containing fragile objects, and it will activate whenever the box is shaken too hard. An audible reminder will prevent those handling it from damaging the content.

•Reminder yourself with recorded instructions to take daily medication, or record a set of complicated instructions when you can’t remember. 

How You Can Help

Although KaKa is designed and ready for distribution, we still need funds to put into, manufacture, build moulds, printer boards, various other production material, and paying for use of the factory itself. We’d like to offer as many incentives as possible for those who are able to contribute the money we will need to make this happen. The funds gathered from this campaign will take our working prototypes and begin large-scale product, as well a sand go towards letting the world know that this solution exists. The more we can produce in a single run, the cheaper the price per unit will be! Take advantage of the special low prices we are offering during this campaign, because you won’t always be able to get KaKa this cheap. 

Tell Your Friends

Our mission is to give smart, useful gadgets to everyone, and the empower people who need help remembering things and living with greater care. It doesn’t matter if they are a friend, family member, lover, or a coworker at the office.

If you’ve ever wished it was easier to share important messages and be reminded of what matters, then you should already see the enormous value of KaKa. We’d like to serve as an inspiration for other entrepreneurs and startup enterprises to get out there and release their innovations to the world through the crowdfunding model. We know a lot of people who need a solution like this, so tell your friends to contribute so we can promote it to the world. Sharing this campaign on your social media profile is just as valuable to us as an actual financial pledge.

FAQ


1) What is the angle of PIR motion sensor?

The sensor is fix to the top of kaka orb, it have 120 degree detection angle and can direct it using the magnetic point. It have five magnet point allow you to change the sensor direction.

2) How far is the PIR motion sensor length?

approximately 3 meter

3) Do kaka fix to metal surface securely

 Yes , KaKa magnet is strong enough to fix to metal surface as we are tested

4)How about the playback voice volume

  kaka with optimum level voice output , suitable for indoor and it not noisy during playback

5) How long does it battery last?

 kaka have design automatically switch to sleep mode, that will conserve the energy, and also with a small hidden power switch to turn off entirely.

6)Does kaka  have difference colour ?

No, unless we reach our 1stbatch production,  we will manufacture more attractive colour choices.

7) Can all the sensors activate at the same time?

No, you only turn on the sensor you need.

story:
Background

Like most new golfers, I struggled with the game; especially with putting. The flat-faced putter I used seemed to have too many variables involved to hit it correctly and consistently.  One day, looking at the Newton’s Cradle sitting on my desk, I wondered why putters weren’t round-faced.  The Cradle demonstrates momentum but clearly illustrates a ball hitting a ball of the same size will always hit that ball at its center of gravity; and isn’t that what we’re trying to do on the course?

I set out to develop and test my theory and after years of study and prototype development - introduced the MxV1 putter at this year’s PGA Show.  

Others, who have attempted to create a round-faced putter, have never achieved a scientifically proven true roll with every stroke - our Center Strike Technology® - inherent in the patent-pending MxV1 putter. Our testing has proven to outperform the #1 putter currently on tour.

The MxV1 putter conforms to both USGA and R&A Rules of Golf making it a legal club in tournament play throughout the world!

 

The Challenge

Entry into the Golf industry can be an expensive undertaking - the “big boys” out buy and out spend all independent producers like myself. They occupy the media, retail, and sponsorships - all touches. If not for the accolades, data and customer responses I’ve received so far - I might have surrendered to them, and given up.

The MxV1 needs your help to survive. 

 

What We Need

Our stretch goal is $250K to ensure a properly funded go-to-market strategy implementation, one that will compete with the “big boys.”  

Raising our intermediate goal of $50K is needed to increase product awareness through aggressive online advertising, trade show, road tour gorilla marketing, advertising and promotion opportunities. Funding is also needed to further pursue market and MxV product research and development, hire appropriate talent to execute on the business plan, and scale up manufacturing capacity to reduce overall costs.

We see the following funding milestones:

First $10K – will launch a direct response television test – reaching more than 1 million viewers.

Next $15K – will create an inside sales team, reaching out to the on-course pro shops, developing the retail relationships that will get the club “into the hands” of the golfer, and lower scores on the scorecard.

And the next $25K will be used to continue creating brand strength one-on-one with our customers, through on-course demo days.

 

Design, performance, science and guarantee make up the MxV1’s competitive advantages.

A major pain point with recreational golfers is the dreaded 3-putt.

According to Average Golfer “A golfer that averages a score of 100 hits 0 greens in regulation, 11% of fairways, has 38.3 putts, 0 birdies, and 1.3 pars”. - http://averagegolfer1.blogspot.com/2008/06/aver...

Common putting mistakes include a lack of confidence, uneven strokes, no putting routine, and worry about outcome, i.e. the accuracy of the roll.

There has not been any significant advances in putter design or technology in quite some time. The major manufacturers are slow to respond to new ideas and have been producing obscure, often bizarre models under the guise of the “latest” this or that. None have... until now!  

By its design and preferred stroke technique (sole, press, sweep) the MxV1 putter creates a relaxed routine with a smooth, free-swinging pendulum motion. Coupled with its Center Strike Technology®, the putter builds confidence by increasing accuracy.

The MxV1 with Center Strike Technology® (CST) is scientifically proven to outperform both the Odyssey Two-Ball and Nike Method putters by 6%. 

MxV1 offers true roll (no backspin), which gets the ball rolling immediately off the face for more accurate putting (lower scores).

If your MxV1 putter should fail due to a manufacturer defect (not direct abuse) we will replace the head free of charge less shipping.

 

 

See mxvgolf.com for more MxV1 putter details. Please share this project on your blog, Facebook, and Twitter! Tell your friends if you have backed this product, and encourage them to do the same.
